query:
SELECT
                    u.first_name,
                    u.last_name,
                    COALESCE(u.email, '') AS email,
                    u.phone,
                    COALESCE(d.department, '') AS departments,
                    COALESCE(d.position, '') AS position
                FROM users u
                JOIN doctor_profile d ON d.user_id = u.user_id
                WHERE u.user_id = $1
